title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\ChunkFormatter
name: ChunkFormatter
description: Converts cell chunks into an easily digestable format. Please note this class implements the IteratorAggregate interface, and as such can be iterated over directly in order to access the formatted rows.

params.name: readRowsCall
params.description: A callable which executes a read rows call and returns a stream.

params.name: tableName
params.description: The table name used for the read rows call.

methods.name: readAll
methods.description: Formats the row's chunks into a friendly format.

exceptions.description: If a malformed response is received.
